sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_properties</collection> <condition>current.operation() == 'delete' || current.value.changes() </condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sys_properties">name=glide.awa.enable_routing_subflow^EQ<item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="glide.awa.enable_routing_subflow"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>AWA Outbound Activation/Deactivation</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { sn_awa.AWAOutboundEventUtils.deregisterResponder(); if (current.value == 'true' && current.operation() != 'delete') { sn_awa.AWAOutboundEventUtils.registerResponder(); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-03-31 22:45:15</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>06a1df420f220110d106ac5397767e79</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AWA Outbound Activation/Deactivation</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Advanced Work Assignment" source="com.glide.awa">d13c46ab47664210cd4e1ce4316d4391</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_06a1df420f220110d106ac5397767e79</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-05 21:15:19</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=06a1df420f220110d106ac5397767e79"/> </record_update>
